short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stackball.io In this game, you will smash, bump and bounce to be able to reach the end on revolving helix platforms

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Here's an awesome arcade game for you: Stackball.io. In this game, you will smash, bump and bounce to be able to reach the end on revolving helix platforms. Be careful: if your ball hits a black platform, you are dead. In that case, your ball flies to pieces and you'll have start over. With its fun and simple gameplay, you'll get addicted to this game! Have fun and good luck!
